com.plexobject.jms

Interface JMSContainer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Lifecycle, MessageListenerContainer, MessageSenderContainer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseJMSContainer, DefaultJMSContainer

    public interface JMSContainer
extends MessageListenerContainer, MessageSenderContainer, Lifecycle
    This interface encapsulates creation of JMS container for sending and receiving messages

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addExceptionListener(javax.jms.ExceptionListener l)
      This method is used to register exception listener in case of connection errors so that clients can re-register listener
      javax.jms.Destination getDestination(java.lang.String destName)
      This method resolves and returns destination
